evt_001_info_freedom.title: Information Freedom Act Proposed
evt_001_info_freedom.text: A proposal suggests making all non-critical planetary data freely accessible. This could spur innovation but might decrease centralized control.

narratives.option1: Open data sparks a wave of creativity across the settlements.
narratives.option2: Caution prevails. You commission further studies on the potential impacts.
narratives.option3: The proposal is shelved, maintaining the status quo for information control.
